episodes.title: Ramadan Is Coming
episodes.plot: Leyla is in U.S.A. Mecnun is so depressed about this and he wants to bring her back with Dede's help.

episodes.title: Yozgat
episodes.plot: Aksakalli Dede is lost. Mecnun wants to find him. He discovers that Leyla is kidnapped. Benjamin makes Mecnun see weird dreams.

episodes.title: Mecnun
episodes.plot: Leyla is kidnapped and Mecnun wants to save her. He learns everything was just a game. When he learns everyone was in the game, Mecnun shoots himself in the head.

episodes.title: Beyin
episodes.plot: Mecnun is in coma. The crew enter Mecnun's subconscious in order to save him.

episodes.title: Nurten'in Yegeni
episodes.plot: Mecnun suddenly decides to marry Nurten's niece. Everyone is shocked by this decision.

episodes.title: Evlenme
episodes.plot: Mecnun suddenly changes his mind. He doesn't want to marry Nurten's niece anymore but brothers of the bride force him for marriage.

episodes.title: Uzay
episodes.plot: Aliens, who have no feelings, come to the earth to investigate about love. When they see the love between Leyla and Mecnun, they decide to kidnap them.

episodes.title: Baz Istasyonu
episodes.plot: The cell site, which Erdal has gotten, causes a big complication in the galactic system. Planets changes their places and because of that some changes happen in the world. Everyone has different personality except Leyla, Mecnun and Ismail.

episodes.title: Illuzyon Nasil Ki Bir Goz Yanilmasiysa, Ask da Bir Gonul Yanilmasidir
episodes.plot: Leyla eavesdrops a conversation of Mecnun and assumes that Mecnun doesn't want to be with her anymore.

episodes.title: Kimi Vedalarda Hoscakal Denilmez!
episodes.plot: Zeynep abandons the neighborhood and moves to a different city. Leyla has a big traffic accident.

episodes.title: Hayat, Damarlarindan Tutup Zorla Icine Ceker Insani
episodes.plot: Mecnun speaks for the first time, one year after Leyla's death. He still can't accept the truth so he travels through time with Dede in order to save her.

episodes.title: Sari Biyik
episodes.plot: Leyla's organs were donated by her family. Arda's father kidnaps all the people who has Leyla's organs. He wants to create a Leyla for Arda. Mecnun meets Sedef and Sirin.

episodes.title: Gercek Kesik
episodes.plot: Ismail sells his organs for money. Mecnun seeks the person who has Leyla's heart. Erdal Bakkal is kidnapped.

episodes.title: Leyla'nin sesi
episodes.plot: Mecnun gets close with Sedef and Sirin. Iskender, Ismail and Yavuz start working in Erdal Bakkal as pupils.

episodes.title: Hayal Kirikliklari Muzesi
episodes.plot: Mecnun is about to marry Sirin. There are two different Dede. Everyone has a big disappointment.

episodes.title: Askin Formulu
episodes.plot: There are six unsolved math problems in the world. There is one million dollar reward for each problem. Everyone tries to solve these problems. Mecnun also tries to find the formula of love.

episodes.title: Marduk
episodes.plot: A big meteor, which name is Marduk, is about collide with the world. The Maya calendar reaches its last date. Everyone assumes that this is the end of the world. Mecnun and his friends try to stop the world from ending.

episodes.title: Sir
episodes.plot: Mecnun finds the truth about Sedef's father. Sirin sees Aksakalli Dede in her dream and she wants to find out if Aksakalli Dede is real.

episodes.title: Hosgeldin 2013
episodes.plot: Mecnun seeks to find the flower of fairy tales. There is a big new year party at Mecnun's house.

episodes.title: Masal Cicegi
episodes.plot: Mecnun loves Sirin and Sedef loves Mecnun. No one knows what to do about this situation.

episodes.title: Yavuz Nasil Kurtulur?
episodes.plot: Yavuz gets caught during a robbery and goes to jail. The crew make a plan to save him from the jail.

episodes.title: Okul Yolunda
episodes.plot: Sedef tells Mecnun that she loves him. Erdal tells the story of how he met Nurten.

episodes.title: Ismail Abi
episodes.plot: Mecnun and Ismail have an argument. Ismail feels sorry and abandons the neighborhood. No one can find Ismail.

episodes.title: Mecnun'luk Istidadi
episodes.plot: The flower of fairy tales dries. Mecnun tries to save it.

episodes.title: Talih Kusu
episodes.plot: Iskender goes to jail. Everyone is frustrated about this situation. The crew make a plan to rescue Iskender while he is threatened in the jail.

episodes.title: Made in Metonya
episodes.plot: Mecnun learns that Sedef's old name was Leyla. Yavuz falls in love. Metin has founded a state, which is called Metonya. He gives a big reward for people who want to be a citizen of his country. Erdal goes to Metonya.

episodes.title: Ardadan
episodes.plot: Mecnun still can't forget Leyla. Arda's father founds a new company called Ardadan. He wants to sell people all the products of the company.

episodes.title: Tarihler Arasi Yolculuk
episodes.plot: Mecnun finds a supernatural door in Metonya. When he passes through the door, he travels through time. He goes to a different year, each time he passes the door.

episodes.title: Maske
episodes.plot: Sedef meets a new guy. The guy helps everybody and everyone loves him. Mecnun is jealous for Sedef.

episodes.title: Who I am?
episodes.plot: Mecnun tries to know himself better. Yavuz learns that Eylul doesn't love him.

episodes.title: Metaforya
episodes.plot: Sevim is kidnapped by the king of Metaforya. Metin wants to save his wife with the crew's help.

episodes.title: Paralel Evren
episodes.plot: Somehow, Mecnun travels through parallel universes. He sees a different life of himself in each one.

episodes.title: Baba Olmak
episodes.plot: Nurten is pregnant. Erdal has fears about being a father.

episodes.title: Drakulluk Edene Yaziklar Olsun
episodes.plot: Dracula comes to Kirecburnu. Everyone turns into a vampire but Mecnun and Iskender. Mecnun wants to end this madness.

episodes.title: Hayalet Avcilari
episodes.plot: There are some ghosts in the neighborhood. The crew tries to hunt them. Mecnun has to make a decision between Sedef and Sirin.

episodes.title: Mecnun Harikalar Diyarinda
episodes.plot: Everyone turns into a character from different fairy tales. Mecnun wants to find his princess.

episodes.title: Bela
episodes.plot: There are a lot of problems the crew needs to deal.

episodes.title: Ama Babacigim
episodes.plot: Eylul's father is about to die but Eylul doesn't believe him. She thinks that he lies like always. Yavuz, Mecnun, Ismail and Iskender start working at the house of Eylul's father.

episodes.title: Niyetci
episodes.plot: Sirin wants to be with Mecnun again. She and Arda's father have some bad plans. They decide to use Ismail for their plans and give him a new job.

episodes.title: Karabasan
episodes.plot: Arda's father steals Aksakalli Dede's wand. He wants to make people live in a world of nightmares. The crew tries to get the wand back.

episodes.title: Dagilis
episodes.plot: Sedef, Sirin and Eylul abandons the neighborhood. Everyone is so desperate about their relationships.
